alert.note: Alert for Northwest Randolph; Northwest Webster; Southeast Pocahontas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 24 at 9:09AM EDT until April 25 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING FOR THIS MORNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Northwest Webster, Southeast Pocahontas and Northwest Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Randolph; Northwest Webster; Southeast Pocahontas
